tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Hemlock
programme.desc: By mistake a foreign agent sends a fax to Meg's office; then he retrieves it and shoots Meg to prevent her from identifying him.(n)

programme.title: JAG: High Ground
programme.desc: A Marine sniper receives orders contrary to a previous deal; his CO refuses to listen; the sniper takes a shot at the CO's Humvee.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Smoked
programme.desc: After a lightning strike, an F-14 wanders into Cuban airspace, and Cuban fighters force it to land.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Black Ops
programme.desc: A Naval aviator, while temporarily assigned to a SEAL team, drowns at sea; he was the son of a woman senator.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Survivors
programme.desc: In a civilian court Harm represents a divorced (and emotionally baffled) Marine colonel, who has gotten into trouble over an unauthorized visit with his minor son.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Hard Knox
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is hired by the Department of Defense to break into Fort Knox and "steal" a precious artifact in order to test their security.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Chernobyl Intentions
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes to Chernobyl to repair the decaying nuclear reactor before a catastrophic meltdown.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must out-think their unstable ex-Scorpion member after he kidnaps Toby and threatens to kill him unless his cunning demands are met.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Civil War
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must put aside their personal and romantic predicaments when anonymous hackers with unknown motives take control of U.S. military aircraft and warships and point weapons at American cities.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: And More Civil War
programme.desc: Just as Team Scorpion makes headway against the hackers controlling U.S. naval destroyers, they learn that a U.S. nuclear submarine also has been hacked and has a missile about to launch.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deal with the Devil
programme.desc: In the midst of a chaotic day at the station, Oliver prepares Andy to defend herself at Duncan’s dismissal hearing, now happening two hours from now.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Chris’s addiction issues come to a head when an innocuous call to a middle-class home puts Dov and Chris in the middle of a suspicious home invasion investigation.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: "Moving Day"
programme.desc: 15 Division is assigned to a community outreach program, “Moving Day”, to help tenants move out of a subsidized-housing complex that’s being torn down.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette starts the new series with an investigation at the haunted Eden Camp. Strange noises and an unknown force try to separate the team. Can they endure the entire investigation, or will the paranormal activity prove too much for them to handle?(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her world-famous team continue investigating Eden Camp. Splitting into lone vigils, they quickly regret it as lost souls, dark shadows, and disembodied voices haunt this living museum, all eager to make their presence known.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit this deserted old mansion which is way past its original splendour. They are soon surrounded by unexplained activity as something is following them and for at least two members of crew, they are pushed to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to the mysterious Guys Cliffe House, once a private dwelling, it is now home to the Fraternal Brotherhood of Freemasons. The team are followed by a very persistent poltergeist that will seem to stop at nothing to get their attention.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Distillery of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Buffalo Trace Distillery in Frankfort, Kentucky to investigate hauntings at the oldest operating distillery in America.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hotel Haunts Unleashed
programme.desc: On this episode on Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to South Dakota for the first time to investigate the Alex Johnson Hotel, a place filled with history.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Well of Horror
programme.desc: TAPS is joined by Jason's daughter, Haily, on two cases; The Shanley Hotel in Napanoch, New York and Old Fort Niagara, in Youngstown, New York. Both cases involve a gruesome death that took place at a well, instigating paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hoover Damned
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Boulder City, Nevada to investigate Boulder City Hospital.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and his new Commonwealth fleet take on the Drago-Kazov fleet but find it much larger than expected.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog eggs in Harper are starting to hatch, so the team builds a Teseract machine.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan takes over a tourist barge in an attempt to escape mercenaries.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.67
programme.desc: Teenager sued by cousin for drunk driving; blames cousin for letting minors drink. Woman claims sprayed with hose due to dog suspected of relieving on neighbor's lawn.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.193
programme.desc: Custody battle and bounced check drama escalate with Wal Mart "Amber Alert." Mother-daughter lawsuit ensues from car wreck involving hitchhikers.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.120
programme.desc: A woman and her teen daughter accuse an estranged relative of assaulting them at a family party/A woman is suing her former friend for repossessing her truck; her friend argues that the vehicle was never insured.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.189
programme.desc: A handgun comes between a brother and sister who sue over the alleged destruction of property during a heated fight.\t\t\t\r\nAccusing his mother of losing his rightful inheritance, a man denies owing her for unpaid loans and car insurance payments.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.226
programme.desc: A father intervenes, hiring attorneys to aid his son in jail release and custody battles after domestic violence charges. The son denies owing anything. A teenager sues ex-roommates for lease breakage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.125
programme.desc: Family disputes details and payment for deceased woman's $19,000 funeral after 15-year cancer battle/Ex-boyfriend sued for unpaid credit card charges in her name; cites father's death and hardships.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.76
programme.desc: Breast feeding a child while taking Vicodin is the accusation laid\t\t\t\r\nagainst a woman whose husband is being sued by a former friend\t\t\t\r\nfor an unpaid loan/A man accidentally kicks a female co-worker in the head while goofing around in the office.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.25
programme.desc: Paint-gun player sued for shooting alleged drug addict in head; claims $10 deal/Woman sues ex-friend for car damage during move; he asserts abandonment with video evidence.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.253
programme.desc: A man is suing his ex-girlfriend’s son for allegedly stealing his dog and for purposely ramming his car with his bicycle.\t\t\t\r\nA loan to pay life insurance, the return of property, and alleged harassment are disputed by ex-lovers.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.248
programme.desc: A woman and her mother sue their former friend for furniture return; he claims they owe him a loan. Another woman sues her son's ex-friend's mother for car impound costs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.26
programme.desc: Intoxicated bride sues friend for face punch at wedding, accused teen claims self-defense/Woman accuses ex of cheating, he defends as moving on; dispute over living room set balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.94
programme.desc: A single mother dips into her savings to bail an ex-boyfriend out of jail after he was arrested for not paying child support.A woman sues her granddaughter for money she allegedly borrowed to pay for her prom.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Sixteen chefs compete in rigorous culinary challenges under the exacting eye of chef Gordon Ramsay, hoping to win a position at a restaurant in Atlantic City, N.J.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The competition heats up as the teams face another gruelling challenge; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants go to a meat locker to learn about cuts of beef. The teams race to impress chef Ramsay when they are asked to put their newfound knowledge to the test.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 13 remaining chefs compete in two teams to feed 50 hungry kids from a football and cheerleading program. The losing team will have to clean the kitchens and finish prep work for the service challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay asks the chefs to create three Asian-fusion dishes using poultry, seafood and beef. Both teams crack under pressure when they go head-to-head during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must prepare food for a bar mitzvah. After one contestant is eliminated, the top 10 chefs are revealed.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Captain Lou
programme.desc: First, Lyndah and Matt interrupt a debtor's bicycle ride to repossess his Jeep, but when Matt's buttons get pushed, some bikes might get broken. Then, Froy and Sonia negotiate with a sensible debtor who's more trouble than she seems... or is she? And fina.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Native Operation
programme.desc: First, Matt and Lou confront an ungentlemanly drunk at an upscale gentleman's club in an effort to repossess his late-model BMW. Then, Sonia and Matt head over to the wrong side of the tracks to reclaim a motorcycle from a different kind of biker.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Should Have Seen This Coming
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy unfurl an elaborate sting when they repo a taxicab by tricking its driver into picking them up. But what to do with his ferociously inebriated client?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Vampires and Drunks
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia take a trip to Beverly Hills to interrupt the salon appointment of a wealthy trophy wife who isn't going to let her prized possession go without a fight. Then, Sonia and Matt use the cover of night to sneak away a Nissan.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: I Don't Know What That Is
programme.sub-title: I Don't Know What That Is
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy crash a raucous brew-fest to sneak an ATV away from a crowd of tipsy revelers. Then, Matt and Lou come face-to-face with a fraternity prank gone awry - these college kids have a sledgehammer, and they're not afraid to use it.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Incompetent and Unfaithful
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy slip into a gated community for a repossession only to attract the attention of a trio of irate and incompetent security guards. Then, Lou and Sonia come face-to-face with a debtor and her entire adult-league softball team.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Don't Cry, Bro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy track a car to the compound of what seems to be a polygamist cult. Will their charismatic leader put up a fight for his Prius, or will he have his followers do it for him?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Day of the Dog
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Monster Hunters
programme.desc: When an alien prison ship crash lands and unleashes creature after creature in the California desert, they make quick work of the army that tries to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: Taking Earth
programme.desc: The human race is thrown into chaos when an alien invasion takes place. But the aliens have arrived for a very specific reason - to find the one boy out of 7 billion people who holds the power to destroy them.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it. Feat: Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Freight
programme.desc: A Russian gang in the UK traffics Eastern Europeans and then enslaves them. The women forced into sex, the men into illegal fights. When they cross a local businessman, a war escalates.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Mississippi
programme.desc: Photographer Holly returns to Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. Their traditional holiday light show has been revived again since a hurricane struck five years earlier. She is shocked to learn the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Karen
programme.desc: Karen is an entitled middle-aged woman whose demanding nature has alienated her loved ones. After a series of instances displaying her privilege, Karen receives an intervention from some unconventional spirits.(n)

programme.title: A Screenshot to Santa
programme.desc: In this holiday family film, two sisters left home alone on December 23rd overcome their sibling rivalry as they stave off would-be intruders.(n)

programme.title: Christmas In The City
programme.desc: After closing down her family business, Wendy and her daughter move to the city for a job in the toy department. Her excitement is short lived when the store's consultant ruins the holiday spirit by replacing Santa with a male underwear model.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: Evil Doctor
programme.desc: Expectant parents Aubrey and Matt find their lives haunted, and their marriage tested, by an unhinged OB GYN with a mysterious past and who is after their child.(n)

programme.title: Stressed to Death
programme.desc: A former EMT still stricken with PTSD over not being able to save a man's life in time, becomes the target of the victim's wealthy wife who blames her for his death.(n)

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Nearly two decades after being committed to a mental institution for killing his stepfather and older sister, Michael Myers breaks out, intent on returning to his hometown. He arrives on Halloween to hunt down his younger sister, Laurie.(n)

programme.title: After Dark, My Sweet
programme.desc: An ex-boxer (Jason Patric), a widow (Rachel Ward) and a con man (Bruce Dern) try a kidnap caper in a desert town.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Catherine Bell) tracks a kidnapper while developing a rapport with his latest victim.(n)

programme.title: A Soldier's Revenge
programme.desc: Frank Connor is a Civil War hero turned bounty hunter. When two children turn up on his doorstep, desperate for his help to find their missing mother, Frank finds he must face up to his past and the notorious Major with whom he has an old score to settle.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Breaking Point
programme.desc: A prospector hits a lucrative vein, and he's not about to share it with anyone — not even his partner.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Girl with a Gun
programme.desc: An outlaw's daughter feels that her father was murdered unjustly and joins his old gang bent on revenge.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Way Station
programme.desc: Jason Barnes takes a job on a railroad with a plan to marry a railroad executive's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Unshakable Man
programme.desc: The story of Amadeo Giannini and the creation of the Bank of America.(n)

programme.title: The Man Without A Face
programme.desc: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then, he finds out the disfigured recluse (Mel Gibson, "Braveheart") living nearby is an ex-teacher.(n)

programme.title: The Chaperone
programme.desc: Ray’s been asked to chaperone a school trip with his daughter Sally’s class. When characters from Ray’s criminal past believe he stole the loot from a bank they robbed, Ray will do whatever it takes to keep his daughter and her class out of harms way.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Maire prays that her husband find the strength to let go of their 9 year marriage. Billy is asking that his wife receive the strength and wisdom to hold on. A 8-year-old runaway from heaven takes it upon herself to rekindle the romance that slipped away.(n)

programme.title: Blackball
programme.desc: In the world of spectator sports, there are of course the all time greats: football, rugby, tennis, golf and... lawn bowls? Try as he might, Cliff Starkey (Paul Kaye) just can't keep out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: Unicorn City
programme.desc: To prove leadership skills to a potential employer, Voss, a hardcore gamer entices his gamer buddies to create a utopia, but paradise is disrupted when his former nemesis and guild master decides to wage war for the city and the heart of Voss’ true love.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: The Riddle of the Sands
programme.desc: Two former British school friends take to the high seas to thwart a German invasion of Britain in 1901.(n)

programme.title: The Upturned Glass
programme.desc: Suspenseful psychological thriller about a prosperous British brain surgeon who plots to murder the woman responsible for the death of the girl he loved.(n)

programme.title: To the Public Danger
programme.desc: Four people meet in a pub and enjoy alcohol fuelled thrill seeking until things get out of hand and each person faces a moral choice with long-lasting consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
programme.desc: A quiet tenant at a London boarding house is suspected of being Jack the Ripper in Alfred Hitchcock's silent classic.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Memories
programme.desc: A hypnotist who specializes in helping people relive their past lives tries to find her own history. She hypnotizes herself and when she awakens, she learns that everyone can now remember their past lives. They also desperately want to forget them.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Hellgramite Method
programme.desc: An alcoholic goes through an extremely painful and potentially deadly cure for his drinking problem. He has to choose which is more important - the bottle or his life.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Our Selina is Dying
programme.desc: A young woman, Debra, comes to live with her mysterious family, including the dying patriarch Selena. After Selena clutches Debra's hand firmly leaving an odd spot on it, Debra begins to age very fast while Selena rejuvenates.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Call
programme.desc: A lonely man accidentally phones the wrong number and finds an intriguing female to whom he grows attached. When she refuses to meet him, he investigates and finds the phone in a museum next to the statue of a woman.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Trance
programme.desc: A scam artist purports to channel the spirit of Delos, a former inhabitant of Atlantis. Together with a partner, he makes a living off of it.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Acts of Terror
programme.desc: A woman terrorized by her abusive husband finds some small consolation in a statue of a dog given to her by her sympathetic sister.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Smoking Gun
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel search for Al Capone's diamond-encrusted gun at the behest of a man hoping it will clear his grandfather of a murder he was framed for.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Affaire de Coeur
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Scotland to find the second ring of the pair of Twining Rings of Calum and Elena.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Edward
programme.desc: A young artist with an uncanny ability to draw remarkably detailed pictures from memory may be the key to a solving a case surrounding the suspicious death of his abusive father.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Requiem
programme.desc: Magnus and Will investgate a distressing call for help deep below the Bermuda Triangle resulting in a deadly battle to save Magnus’s life.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Warriors
programme.desc: Investigating the disappearance of an old college friend, Will finds himself caught in an underground fight club where the combatants are genetically engineered abnormals who fight to the death like modern day gladiators.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Trust (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante's still impressionable teenage niece, Percy, comes under the sway of a young, handsome psychopath. Her actions inadvertently threaten the life of her uncle.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Order (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a ship of religious cultists commit mass suicide by diving their ship into the sun, the crew rescues a shuttle full of survivors, including the cult leader himself, Brother Thirteen.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Siren's Song (REDUX)
programme.desc: After the crew capture a murderous psychopath named Petrakis, they cross paths with a Major Bartlett, who has a prisoner of his own to move... and military authorization to commandeer the Tulip.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!(n)
